name: Weezing
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: Inhaling toxic fumes from trash and mixing them inside its body lets it spread an even fouler stench.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent’s attack, discard the top 3 cards of your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Smogbank
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
